root.name: The Night of the Rabbit
root.description: OverviewThe Night of the Rabbit, originally titled The Rabbit's Apprentice, is a puzzle adventure game by developer Daedalic, the team who made the Deponia series.Written and designed by Matthias Kempke Plot12 Year Old Jeremiah Hazelnut dreams of becoming a Wizard and learn the craft of magic. While on vacation, Jeremiah meets the well dress Marquis de Hoto, a tall rabbit, who offers him the chance to become his apprentice. Jeremiah is then transport to an enchanted realm.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS:Windows XPProcessor:2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)Memory:2 GB RAMGraphics:OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 256 MB RAMDirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:6 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX compatibleRecommended:OS:Windows Vista/7/8Processor:2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)Memory:4 GB RAMGraphics:OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAMDirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:6 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX compatibleMac System RequirementsMinimum:OS:Lion (10.7)Processor:2 GHz (Dual Core) IntelMemory:2 GB RAMHard Drive:7 GB HD spaceRecommended:OS:Lion (10.7)Processor:2 GHz (Dual Core) IntelMemory:2 GB RAMHard Drive:7 GB HD space
